academies_api.endpoint: This is the endpoint for the Academies API, used for read-only reference data. Override in environment-specific config.
academies_api.key: API Key for the Academies API. Override in environment-specific secrets.

academisation_api.endpoint: This is the endpoint for the academisation API, used for conversion data. Override in environment-specific config.
academisation_api.key: API Key for the academisation API. Override in environment-specific secrets.

emailnotifications.key: API key from GOV UK notify
